title: Coproad — Strengthening Vision and Driving Growth in Eastern DRC

children.text: Coproad, a cooperative of cocoa farmers in Beni, faced internal alignment issues that hindered growth. While deeply committed to improving farmer livelihoods, the leadership team needed clarity around strategy, roles, and long-term goals to secure financing and scale operations sustainably.

Kilalo partnered with Coproad to help the cooperative strengthen its strategic foundation and marketing direction. Through a structured engagement, Kilalo facilitated Vision & Structure workshops that guided the leadership team in:
Clarifying mission, vision, and core values
Establishing 10-year, 3-year, 1-year, and 90-day goals
Addressing internal organizational challenges through open dialogue
Developing a targeted marketing strategy to clearly communicate Coproad's value proposition
With a refined vision and actionable roadmap, Coproad emerged stronger, more aligned, and ready to grow. The cooperative:
Defined a clear strategic direction supported by measurable targets
Strengthened team cohesion and decision-making processes
Applied the new marketing strategy to attract new buyers and strengthen credibility
Positioned itself to secure financing from a local bank to support farmer operations

quote.text: The clarity we gained through Kilalo's framework has been invaluable. We've applied what we learned directly into our marketing approach and are now on the verge of securing financing for our next stage of growth.
quote.author: Coproad Leadership Team

children.text: By helping Coproad align around a shared vision and strategy, Kilalo supported the cooperative in advancing its mission to improve the welfare of cocoa farmers — a step toward a more resilient and equitable agricultural sector in the DRC.

title: NNP_DRC — Amplifying Voices Through Media and Storytelling

children.text: In a region where many powerful stories go untold, NNP_DRC (Nyiragongo Ngoma Production) has become a creative force for change. The multimedia company helps organizations and entrepreneurs communicate with clarity and purpose through video, design, and storytelling.
As Kilalo sought to amplify the visibility of Congolese businesses, it recognized that communication is a key pillar of growth — as essential as capital and strategy.
In July 2025, NNP_DRC officially joined the Kilalo portfolio of companies. This partnership was built on shared purpose:
Empowering entrepreneurs to tell their stories effectively
Using creative production to educate, inspire, and engage communities
Supporting Kilalo's broader mission of advancing economic equity and promoting local innovation
By integrating NNP_DRC into the Kilalo ecosystem:
Entrepreneurs in the Vision & Structure Program gained access to professional media support.
Kilalo expanded its capacity to help portfolio companies build brand visibility and share their impact stories.
Together, the partnership strengthened local value chains — showing that creativity and business structure can grow hand-in-hand.

quote.text: We believe this collaboration will amplify the work of Congolese entrepreneurs, strengthen local supply chains, and inspire confidence in homegrown solutions.
quote.author: The Kilalo Team

children.text: NNP_DRC brings the voice and creativity that many Congolese businesses need to thrive. Their inclusion in Kilalo's portfolio ensures that impact-driven ventures not only perform well operationally — they are seen, heard, and celebrated across the region.
